original_text: Three days after the men were circumcised, they still had a lot of pain. Then two of Jacob's sons attacked Shechem's men with their swords. None of the men were ready to fight. Jacob's two sons were Simeon and Levi, Dinah's brothers. They killed every male in the city.
korean_text: 제삼일에 아직 그들이 아파할 때에 야곱의 두 아들 디나의 오라버니 시므온과 레위가 각기 칼을 가지고 가서 몰래 그 성읍을 기습하여 그 모든 남자를 죽이고

sentences.original_text: Three days after the men were circumcised,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 남자들이 할례를 받은 지 삼일 후에,

sentences.original_text: they still had a lot of pain.
attacked Shechem's men with their swords.
None of the men were ready to fight.
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 누구도 싸울 준비가 되어 있지 않았다.

sentences.original_text: Jacob's two sons were Simeon and Levi,
They killed every male in the city.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 도시의 모든 남성을 죽였다.
